features.title: Visual Graph Editor
features.description: Build complete FFmpeg pipelines visually. Connect inputs, filters, encoders, and outputs as nodes—each mapping directly to real FFmpeg commands.

features.title: Custom FFmpeg Builds
features.description: Point to any `ffmpeg` binary. FFStudio auto-detects and exposes your custom filters, codecs, and muxers as configurable nodes.

features.title: Segment Preview Player
features.description: Instantly render and inspect a single frame or a timeline range. Cached previews speed up tuning without full transcoding.

features.title: Integrated Logs
features.description: Step through FFmpeg’s own logs in-app. Color-coded entries, exportable output, and error flags keep you in control.

features.title: Full Filter Graph Support
features.description: Access the full power of FFmpeg filters—including complex chains, conditional logic, and metadata routing—all visually editable.

features.title: Reusable Workflow Library
features.description: Save, export, and share workflows as JSON. Kickstart new projects from built-in examples or maintain cross-team consistency.

features.title: Universal Format Support
features.description: Handle nearly any media format or container supported by FFmpeg—from common to broadcast-grade or experimental codecs.

features.title: Hardware Acceleration
features.description: Enable NVENC, QuickSync, VAAPI, or other GPU-accelerated encoding/decoding via your FFmpeg build for serious throughput gains.
